alert.note: Alert for Benson; Cavalier; Eddy; Griggs; Nelson; Ramsey; Towner; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 06 at 1:19AM CST until November 06 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Towner, Cavalier, Benson, Ramsey, Eddy, Nelson, Griggs and Western Walsh Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 9 AM this morning to 6 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing dust or dirt may result in localized visibility restrictions, especially near finely tilled fields. Finally, hunters should think twice about venturing out on any ponds or lakes.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Benson; Cavalier; Eddy; Griggs; Nelson; Ramsey; Towner; Western Walsh County
